body: LEAD: The Best for Last? The Best for Last? title: On Stage

body: LEAD: UNADORNED homes are rare commodities around Christmastime in Bay Ridge, Bensonhurst and Canarsie. With thousands of plastic Santas and snowmen, armies of toy soldiers and multicolored megawatts of lights decorating block upon block of houses and apartment buildings, no one could accuse these Brooklyn neighborhoods of a lack of holiday cheer.
title: Neighborhoods Santa Has No Trouble Finding
